text: The Romanian Ambassador in Santiago de Chile is the official representative of the Government in Bucharest to the Government of Chile. == List of Ambassadors == {| class="wikitable sortable" !| Diplomatic agrément/Diplomatic accreditation !| Ambassador !| Observations !| List of heads of state of Romania !| List of Presidents of Chile !| Term end |- | |Nicolás Dianu |From to 1939 he was envoy in Moscow.Nicolás Dianu |Carol II of Romania |Carlos Dávila | |- | |Constantin Vallinaresco |Constantin Vallinaresco |Carol II of Romania |Pedro Aguirre Cerda | |- | |Dumitru Fara |Dumitru Fara made a trip to Chile with the objectives of finalizing the cartel |Chivu Stoica |Eduardo Frei Montalva || |- | |Vasil Dumitrescu |Grigore Preoteasa's closest friend was Vasile Dumitrescu, director of Agerpres, then Ambassador of Romania to Switzerland and until retirement in Chile. Vasil Dumitrescu |Nicolae Ceaușescu |Eduardo Frei Montalva | |- | |Víctor Florescu |Victor Torynopol. On his true name, Victor Cornel Florescu, he was born in Lugoj on Christmas Eve of 1922. In Lugoj he will graduate from the primary school and the "Brediceanu" High School, where he will take the baccalaureate. In full war (1942-45), he goes to Bucharest, where he will attend the courses at the Higher Cooperative School. He remains in the Capital, where he is promoted to the National Cooperative Institute (1945-1947) and to the National Bank (1947-1948). In 1950, he entered the Faculty of Letters of the University of Bucharest.Víctor Florescu |Nicolae Ceaușescu |Eduardo Frei Montalva | |- | |Gheorge Petre |Chargé d'affaires |Nicolae Ceaușescu |Augusto Pinochet | |- | |Constantin Eftimie | |Ion Iliescu |Patricio Aylwin | |- | |Constantin Tunsanu |Constantin Tunsanu |Ion Iliescu |Patricio Aylwin | |- | |Vasile Dan |Vasile Dan |Ion Iliescu |Eduardo Frei Ruiz-Tagle | |- | |Ion Vîlcu |From 2013 to 2016 he was Romanian ambassador to Spain |Ion Iliescu |Ricardo Lagos | |- | |Valentín Florea | |Traian Băsescu |Michelle Bachelet | |- | |Florin Angelo Florian |Florin Angelo Florian |Traian Băsescu |Sebastián Piñera | |- | |Monica- Mihaela Ştirbu |Monica-Mihaela Ştirbu |Klaus Iohannis |Sebastián Piñera | |} Romanian Embassy in Santiago, Chile, *Chile–Romania relations == References == Chile Romania
title: List of ambassadors of Romania to Chile
